price: 58.Kaadu Nabiyow Yallay dudda-le manoley rabewaal kelitaay, kaa ceele waytaamak kaa saytunnos kaa faylisak, kaadu Yalli isi naqoosah dambih adda yaaxigem xiqah usun abba haanamak kaak Qellittam matanaay.
arabic: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱلۡحَيِّ ٱلَّذِي لَا يَمُوتُ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِهِۦۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: watawakkal ʿalā al-ḥayi alladhī lā yamūtu wasabbiḥ biḥamdihi wakafā bihi bidhunūbi ʿibādihi khabīran
